email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment? We are aiming for a laycan starting around April 10th.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. The initial freight quote is $45 per metric ton under CIF terms. The laycan window is from April 10th to April 15th.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $45 per metric ton is slightly higher than our budget. Given the current market conditions, could you consider revising the rate to $42 per metric ton? We are also open to discussing a lumpsum offer if that works better for you.

Looking forward to your revised quote.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of $43 per metric ton. Additionally, we can provide a lumpsum offer of $516,000 for the entire shipment. The laycan window remains from April 10th to April 15th.

Please confirm if this revised rate and lumpsum offer are acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $43 per metric ton and the lumpsum offer of $516,000 are acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements for the MV OCEAN HORIZON. We will confirm the laycan window of April 10th to April 15th.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - 12,000 MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements for the MV OCEAN HORIZON and will keep you updated on the progress. The laycan window is confirmed for April 10th to April 15th.

Looking forward to a smooth shipment process.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport Ltd.
